definitions: a person or company residing in or using a property as its owner or tenant, or (illegally) as a squatter.
shortDefinitions: person or company residing in or using property as its owner or tenant

definitions: a member of a group that takes possession of a country by force

examples.text: the occupiers were reported to have rounded up civilians and carried them off to unknown fates

shortDefinitions: member of group that takes possession of country by force
